content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. The apartment you're interested in is a lovely 25 square meter space located in a prime location of the city. In terms of rental price, I am open to discussing options with you. What kind of budget do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 1000 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I'm sorry to hear that you're not interested in the apartment at this time. If you ever change your mind, please feel free to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month
